Children could play with their imagination and create their own toys using materials they have at home, such as cardboard boxes, paper, and string.
Children could play with natural objects such as leaves, sticks, and rocks.
Children could play with their family members or friends, using their creativity and imagination to come up with new games and activities.
Children could play with their pets, creating new games and activities that involve their furry friends.
Children could play with technology, using their creativity to create new games and applications that can be played on smartphones, tablets, and computers.
